name: Solenars Edge Rebirth: Nathuz Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Take home part of the Solenars Edge Rebirth Soundtrack as preformed by Nathuz!
Help support this talented musical artist by purchasing this DLC!



Track List:
1. Blast
2. Calling Voices
3. Crystal
4. Divine
5. Dreams
6. Fallen
7. Happy Tune
8. Intense
9. Lost Heart
10. Master Plan
11. Nature #4
12. Rain
13. Showdown
14. The Final Moment
15. Tribal
16. Vicroty
17. Warm and Fuzzy

*Hidden Bonus Track by Syu-Syu aka Syukino.*
18. Mr. Right
about_the_game:
Take home part of the Solenars Edge Rebirth Soundtrack as preformed by Nathuz!

short_description:
A brilliant and well put together soundtrack by Nathuz, featuring various songs that were featured in Solenars Edge Rebirth!
Show your support by purchasing this musical ballad of epic proportions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 102 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 102 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

legal_notice:
Solenars Edge Rebirth and the Logo are the sole property of Syu-Syu aka Atsumora Sythe.
Also Team Syukino.
